name: Freelancer Market
overview:
Freelancer Market offers freelancer’s the opportunity to bid for freelance jobs in dozens of categories. There are freelance jobs in web design, graphic design, accounting any many more. Registration is quick and simple and freelancers can upload their CV and background.

The website allows clients to outsource their work to our network of freelancers for completely free.

Once a freelancer is selected as the winning bidder they will receive payment through our secure escrow service.

The site aims to make freelancing safe and fun for all parties.
